recipesJson.name: Apple Cinnamon Coffee Cake
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: Apple coffee cake with a touch of cinnamon and a nice cream cheese glaze. I don't really enjoy heavy cinnamon vapes but this is a nice mix with just a bit of cinnamon. Perfect recipe to get you in the mood for fall.

reviews.text: I like how something so simple is also so effective as a recipe. Absolutely delicious! Well done mlNikon
Really enjoyed this one. The ratio of cds to cream cheese icing was perfect for a king cake recipe ive been working on.  Thank you maâ€™am. Found this right in time for Mardi Gras season.
Love this recipe. Nice and simple. The apple isn't enough for me so I upped it a percent and it's perfect. The pound cake and cds are perfect together in this.
Nice well rounded recipe. 2% cds was a little scary but it goes well! This really pushed me into that fall flavor mood
What a delightful looking simple recipe. I haven't mixed this yet, but I'm having trouble getting my ATF reviews to work, and this seemed like as good a place to test it as any.
